note.zh: 如果头痛症状持续时间较长且伴有压力，建议在神经外科或精神健康医学科就诊.

condition.zh: 持续时间较长且伴有压力

note.en: The symptom 'Tinnitus' is typically treated in the Otorhinolaryngology (ENT) department.
note.zh: “耳鸣”症状通常在耳鼻咽喉科就诊。

note.ko: 균형 장애 증상은 일반적으로 재활의학과에서 진료받습니다.
note.en: The symptom 'Balance disorder' is typically treated in the Rehabilitation Medicine department.
note.zh: “平衡障碍”症状通常在康复医学科就诊。

note.ko: 구취 증상은 일반적으로 치과에서 진료받습니다.
note.en: The symptom 'Halitosis' is typically treated in the Dentistry department.
note.zh: “口臭”症状通常在口腔科就诊。

note.en: The symptom 'Nausea' is typically treated in the Internal Medicine department.
note.zh: “恶心”症状通常在内科就诊。

note.en: The symptom 'Loss of appetite' is typically treated in the Internal Medicine department.
note.zh: “食欲不振”症状通常在内科就诊。

note.en: The symptom 'Nosebleed' is typically treated in the Otorhinolaryngology (ENT) department.

note.ko: 홍반 증상은 일반적으로 피부과에서 진료받습니다.
note.en: The symptom 'Red patches' is typically treated in the Dermatology department.
note.zh: “红斑”症状通常在皮肤科就诊。

note.zh: “妄想”症状通常在精神健康医学科就诊。

note.en: The symptom 'Auditory hallucination' is typically treated in the Psychiatry department.

note.en: The symptom 'Hematuria' is typically treated in the Urology department.
note.zh: “血尿”症状通常在泌尿外科就诊。

note.zh: “尿味重”症状通常在泌尿外科就诊。

note.en: The symptom 'Rash' is typically treated in the Pediatrics department.
note.zh: “皮疹”症状通常在儿科就诊。
